dt-button.name: spacer
dt-button.summary: A special "button" which provides visual grouping between buttons.
dt-button.description:
This button type is unique in Buttons in that it doesn't actually display a button or anything the end user can interact with. Rather it simply introduces a space between buttons, allowing easy visual grouping.
As a result the majority of options such as `action`, `init` and so on **do not apply** to this button. Only the options specified below are available.
dt-button.option: The button's display text. The text can be configured using this option (see `b-init buttons.buttons.text`) or the `buttons.spacer` option of the DataTables `dt-init language` object. if specified it can be used to group options with a visual title, which is particularly effective inside collections.
